HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Cijena dostave iznosi 4,99 EURA bez obzira na broj proizvoda koji su naručeni i bez obzira na ukupnu cijenu narudžbe.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: The only available delivery method is home delivery. PROVIDERS: Delivery is handled by Hrvatska pošta (HP PAKET 24). PRICING: There is a flat shipping fee of €4.99 for all orders, regardless of size or value. No free shipping is offered. Cash on delivery is an option, but any potential surcharge is not specified. DELIVERY TIME: The standard delivery time is 3-5 business days. RESTRICTIONS: No information is provided regarding surcharges or restrictions for delivering to Croatian islands. NOTABLE FEATURES: The website highlights its customer support and the option to pay upon delivery. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is minimal and located within the FAQ section, not on a dedicated page. Key details such as express options, weekend delivery, island surcharges, and specific COD fees are missing. There is also conflicting information about the delivery timeframe (2 days vs. 3-5 days).
